name: Slime Cave (Turio)
description:
Slime Cave! Turio's First Game!

A very short platformer about a slime who's fallen down a hole into a crystal cave.
His goal? Get out so he can feel the warm rays of the sun again.
Join the slime as he jumps and dashes his way through a large crystal cave so that he could go back to his favourite resting spot under the tree.
